mapper.select:
select do.doctor_name as doctorName, du.* from duty du left join doctor do on du.doctor_no = do.doctor_no
and doctor_name like CONCAT('%',#{doctorName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

and Tuesday = #{tuesday,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and Tuesday_rest > 0

and Friday = #{friday,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and Friday_rest > 0
and Saturday = #{saturday,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and Saturday_rest > 0
and Sunday = #{sunday,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and Sunday_rest > 0

and Saturday = 1
and Sunday = 1
